text: Ara yedina tini tadera saba'ike ekatra karabena -- ''he jina sampradaya! Tomara manusadera anekake'i niye giyechile.â€™â€™ Ara manabagosthira madhye theke tadera bandhubandhabara balabe -- ''amadera prabhu! Amadera ke'u ke'u an'yadera dbara labhabana hayechilama, kinta amara pauchegechi amadera antima samaye ya tumi amadera jan'ya nirdharita karechile. Tini balabena -- ''aguna hacche tomadera abasasthala, sekhane dirghakala thakabara jan'ya -- allah yake iccha karena se byatita. Nihsandeha tomara prabhu paramajnani, sarbajnata.
